name: Brenden Bishop
title: Builder & Technologist
intro: Husband, father, and technologist. Software Engineering Manager and chronic entrepreneur. I love building, tinkering, and learning new things. Addicted to coffee and X (Twitter).
bio:
I'm a product-minded technologist with 10+ years of experience building zero-to-one products. At Morgan Stanley, I led five greenfield client-facing apps across E*TRADE and Morgan Stanley Online, managing 12 engineers. 

I recently launched an internal AI bootcamp to teach devs how to use LLMs, Copilot, and AI-assisted workflows, accelerating adoption across our org.

I'm also the founder of Forwheel, a platform serving 150+ food trucks, powered by our AI vendor advisor Garnish (OpenAI + RAG). I previously co-founded Rbitrage Capital, growing it to $750K AUM via crypto trading algorithms.
